About Me

Hi there, I am Sujay (unfiltered)üëã.


Welcome to my corner of the internet, where I share my love for all things tech, programming, Life and whatever comes to my mind and I feel like writing. I am not a computer science student, I am a mechanical engineer(by degree) but I didn't get the excitement in it as I thought I would, so I started exploring other fields in lockdown and here I am, writing blogs


Where It All Began

Believe it or not, I was not a computer geek and didn't have (much)acess to the computer. Well, my brother had a laptop but I didn't get the chance to play with it. I got my personal laptop when I was in first year of my college(2021). It was lockdown and I started tinkering. I designed various stuff for my robotics club and academic purposes. Programming for the robots we prototyped for robotics competition ignited my love towards technology. I had hands on experience with Arduion boards, RaspBerry Pi and other stuff. After that I haven't looked back.



Why "Anything & Everything"?

It took me a while to finalize the theme and name for my blog, I came across some great pages like moonwith.com, The Brain Dump, inherently's cabin. I also wanted a simple yet clear name. After careful considerations I thought this would be a descent name that will reflect my motives. I can vent my thoughts here üòÆ‚Äçüí®


Skills and Stuff

I am good at Robotics, Machine Learning, Data Science. I can code in C++, Python, Solidity, Rust, JS. I am more inclined towards Data, Cloud, AI research.[To know more see my Resume] I am learning spanish for fun(I wanted to watch 'La Casa De Papel' in spanish). I can touch type at the speed of nearly 80 wpm. If you want to learn it, I would suggest to start with typingclub.com


Hobbies and More

I usually like to link my tasks and avoid free time and I take periodic brakes in whatever I'm doing. In those breaks I like to talk to others, watch some movie, take a walk, listen to some podcasts, read books, newsletter, scroll through HN, do nothing(It's simple yet very effective).
